refnamediv.refpurpose: Parses an XML fragment and returns the parse tree as nested vectors.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This parses the argument, which is expected to be a well formed XML fragment and returns a parse tree as a structure of nested heterogeneous vectors.

refsect2.title: document
refsect2.para: (mandatory) A well formed XML or HTML document

refsect2.title: parser_mode
refsect2.para: 0, 1 or 2; 0 - XML parser mode, 1 - HTML parser mode, 2 - 'dirty HTML' mode (with quiet recovery after any syntax error)

refsect2.title: base_uri
refsect2.para: (optional) in HTML parser mode change all absolute references to relative from given base_uri (http://<host>:<port>/<path>)

refsect2.title: content_encoding
refsect2.para: (optional) string with content encoding type of <document> valid is 'ASCII', 'ISO', 'UTF8', 'ISO8859-1', 'LATIN-1'.

refsect2.title: content_language
refsect2.para: (optional) - string with language tag of content of <document>; valid names are listed in IETF RFC 1766, default is 'x-any' (it means 'mix of words from various human languages).

refsect2.title: dtd_validator_config
refsect2.para: configuration string for DTD validator, default is empty string meaning that DTD validator should be fully disabled. See Configuration Options of the DTD Validator for details.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: vector of vectors representing the parsed tree of XML.
